alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Howell; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 3:58PM CDT until August 08 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Northern Howell County in south central Missouri... Southern Texas County in south central Missouri... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cabool, or 8 miles northwest of Willow Springs, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Willow Springs... Cabool... Clear Springs... Arroll... Elk Creek... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
